Naruto burped as he slurped down the rest of his ramen noodles. "Wow, I'm stuffed!" he exclaimed happily, leaning back and rubbing his stomach. Over the last week or so, things had been strangely quiet, and no requests for missions had come out. This left many of Konoha's ninja to their own devices. While Naruto initially used this opportunity to train, he found himself training less and less and frequenting Ichiraku Ramen more. This was evident by looking at him; his eating habits and relative inactivity over the last week had caused his stomach to bloat somewhat.

Putting his money down on the counter, Naruto took off, oblivious to the questioning looks of Ayame and her father. As he walked the streets of Konoha, he considered training, right before he let out a huge yawn. "Must be sleepy from the ramen..." he muttered. Letting out another yawn, he started towards his house to get some sleep, regardless of othe fact that it was still early afternoon. While he walked, he rubbed his slightly bloated stomach, grinning at how soothing it felt.

While continuing towards his house, Naruto...

1111.content:
After a few minutes, Naruto finally reached his apartment. As he opened the door, he yawned again. "I guess the walk tired me out a bit..." Naruto mumbled to himself, even though it was only a few minutes between his house and Ichiraku Ramen. Failing to register this, Naruto walked in and threw off his orange jacket, leaving only his black shirt.

Taking off his leaf headband, Naruto walked into the kitchen, and, despite the fact that he had just eaten a large meal, opened the pantry and pulled out a bag of potato chips (he'd snatched them away from Choji while the rotund Genin had been looking the other way,) opened them, and began cramming them into his mouth. Even as he continued eating, he walked over to his bed and sat down.

He continued eating for a few minutes. Then, tiredness overtook him, and he fell back on his bed, the half-eaten bag of chips falling out of his hand. He snored softly for a couple of minutes before he unconsciously brought his hand up to his stomach, pushing his shirt up and revealing the slightly larger belly underneath. His hand's path eventually ended just below his chest. For the next several hours, Naruto remained like that, stomach exposed and snoring away.



What happens next?

The jutsu rebounds on him, turning him into a child instead
11113.content:
As Naruto slept, blissfully unaware of his surroundings, two figures snuck into his house through the open window.

"Heh heh... this'll get him good..."

"Bark!"

"Oh, come on, Akamaru, what's the worst that could happen?" Kiba reassured the dog tucked into his jacket. "He's out cold, and besides.." the dog-nin gestured to the sleeping boy. "...even if he does wake up, I'll be ready for him. I'm not that easy to surprise." Kiba smirked.

"Bark..." The dog sighed in resignation. This wasn't going to end well...

As Kiba made his way over to Naruto's bed, he glanced at the blonde's stomach. "Wow, it looks like Naruto's put on a couple pounds..."

Akamaru glanced at him and barked.

"Whaddaya mean, I've put on a few pounds too?" Kiba demanded. Akamaru barked again. "Well, things have been kinda slow lately... and we've been walking less..."

Kiba shook his head. "I'll check it out later." Kiba fumbled around in his pocket until he pulled out what he was looking for; an old, rolled up, dusty scroll. "Kurenai-sensei's gonna kill me for this..." Kiba winced. Immediately, he smiled. "But, man, will it be worth it!"

He opened the scroll and grinned, his sharp canines showing. "Oh yeah..." After looking at it for a few minutes, he put it down and began performing the hand signs. "Let's see how he reacts when he wakes up... as a kid!" Kiba thought to himself. After completing the hand signs, he uttered the name of the jutsu:

"Secret Art: Age Regression Jutsu!"

What happens next?

111132.content:
Kiba grinned as the jutsu began to take effect, a mass of light beginning to form in the air.

"Heh heh..." Kiba chuckled. Suddenly, the mass of light began to contort and flash different colors.

"W-what the hell!?" Kiba frantically searched the scroll for a way to cancel it, but found nothing. "Aw, crap..." he mumbled.

Meanwhile, the jutsu had been gradually making its way toward him. With a sudden burst of energy, it sped into his chest.

"Agh!" Kiba grunted in pain. He dropped to his knees, clutching his chest. His breathing became increasingly labored, and Akamaru trotted up to him, whimpering in concern.

Despite his pain, Kiba managed to smirk. "I'll be fine, Aka..." A sudden jolt of pain interrupted him... and then the transformation began.

Kiba began to shrink, his surroundings seemingly becoming bigger and bigger. His clothes began to seem unnaturally large, as he tripped and fell backwards, and it was only by supporting himself with his hands was he able to keep from impacting the hard wooden floor.

A growing sense of panic gripped Kiba, confusing and frightening him. Wait... frightening him.

"Aw, crap, don't tell me the jutsu's affecting my mind, too..." he complained, startled at how much younger his voice sounded. Within the next few seconds, his fear and panic began to increase, and his clothes grew so large, the sleeves of his jacket and the legs of his pants trailed from him like snakes.

Where once a 13 year old dog nin had resided, there was now a small, confused, frightened child that couldn't have been more than seven. Trembling, Kiba brought his much smaller hands up to his face.

"N-no way..." he stuttered, his voice now sounding even younger.

At that time...

As Naruto neared his house, his stomach growled. Frowning, Naruto put his hand over his belly.

"I'm still hungry?" he questioned to himself. Regardless, he shrugged, got some money out of his pocket, and began running back to Ichiraku's.
*************************************************
"Another miso ramen!" Naruto called out loudly, setting his fourth bowl to the side. As his order was being prepared, Naruto rubbed his stomach with both hands, grinning. It had grown slightly larger, owing to the fact that he had just eaten four large bowls of Ramen in quick successiion.

Naruto rubbed his hands together in anticipation as his fifth bowl was brought out. Without another word, Naruto tucked into it like a ravenous animal.
****************************************************
Closing his eyes and breathing deeply, Naruto leaned back in his chair, hands resting on his stomach. He'd ended up eating ten bowls of ramen in total, and he was incredibly stuffed-and couldn't be happier. His stomach had increased in size, and it was about as big as it had been when he had pigged out on watermelon with Jiraiya. It didn't concern Naruto much, since it would probably go down in a few hours or so, but as he rubbed his hands against his gut, he sighed happily. This was the life...

Naruto stretched, put his money on the counter, and walked off into the streets of Konoha, rubbing his large belly and getting strange looks from the other villagers.

As he strolled about, he felt an uncomfortable tightness in his gut. Wincing, Naruto unzipped his jacket, giving his belly room. Sighing in relief, Naruto, continued walking, his black shirt clinging tightly to his enlarged stomach

Grinning sleepily, Naruto walked over to the tree, stretched his arms, and plopped down. He began to lay back when he felt a tightness in his belly again. Confused and probing around with his hands, Naruto's hands eventually located the source of the discomfort: his pants button.

11123.content:
His stomach now full of his favourite meal the blond ninja began thinking of how he could burn off his newly acquired calories, and what was the best way for way for a ninja t accomplish this task: training. With that in mind Naruto made a beeline for one of the villages many training grounds.
Upon arriving Naruto thought about what to do first ‘Well I guess doing some warm ups would be a good way to start, like Iruka-sensei told us training without warming up first leads to trouble.’
He then spent the next ten minutes running laps around the field however something was bothering the blond shinobi, for some reason he wasn’t moving as quickly as usual?
Out of breath and panting Naruto decided he’d warmed up enough he went about getting down to business. First up was Taijutsu so he went about making shadow clones and set about dispelling them with a series of kicks and punches however his movements were now fairly sluggish and his belly giggling with every movement.
‘What’s going on, I’ve never had this much trouble before.’ Naruto looked down at his stomach, running his hand over it ‘Maybe I should do something less physical until I’ve given my meal a chance to digest.’
Unable to do his usual training regime Naruto settled for target practise as well as perfecting his chakra control, he headed over to a nearby tree and after carving a target into the wood spent the next hour repeatedly throwing kunai and shurikens at the target several of them hitting the bull’s eye.
With that done Naruto turned his attention to improving his chakra control, looking up at the tree he began pondering how he would go about this when an idea struck him.
Figuring that there was no one around he removed his jacket and t-shirt revealing his chest and now larger belly to the world, then formed the ram seal and began channelling chakra into his feet. Once he’s built up enough he charged up the tree until he came to a branch near the top and jumped up on to the bottom of it.
There he closed his eyes and seemed to go into a trance like state. The idea of the exercise was simple, cling onto the branch for as long as he could using his chakra, sussed and he would remain attached fail and he would plummet to the ground and then a visit to the hospital.
Unbeknown to the blond ninja he was being observed from the bushes nearby....
11123.title: Tries to train, but finds it difficult

111231.content:
From their position the two kunoichi watched as their fellow ninja went about his training regime. Due to the lack of missions coming in over the last week and no reports on either Sasuke and his band of followers or the Akatsuki things had been quiet leaving the villages ninja's with more time on their hands.

Like many of their comrades the pair had spent much of their time hanging out with each other doing most of the things that teenage girls do, gossip, shop, etc, but on the whole just enjoying being around one another like they were when they were kids before Sasuke had brought an end to their friendship. Not to say that they hadn’t put their time to more productive uses either.

Being the apprentices of the Hokage it gave the pair certain privileges such as access to the archives where thousands of scrolls were stored many of which contained difficult or forbidden techniques. Pouring over them in hopes to gain insight into more advanced medical jutsu the pair had come across a particular technique that had interested them no end and worked hard in secret to master it.
The two of them were also involved in why Naruto’s appetite had grown so much recently.

Ino glanced over at Sakura and said “Now?”

Sakura smirked nodded. The two of them slipped out of their hiding place and ran up to where Naruto was hanging from. Slowly Sakura ran her hands over Naruto’s exposed belly, the blond was so deep in concentration that he didn’t notice. ‘So big, but I bet we can make it bigger.’

She glanced over at Ino who gave her a devious grin and the two of them began forming hand seals “Forbidden Technique: Hunger Jutsu!” Both of then poked Naruto in the belly which glowed momentarily then gave a loud growl.

Quickly the two of them vanished before Naruto opened his eyes. The rumbling in his gut caught the blond by surprise and almost caused him to lose his concentration. ‘What the, I only ate an hour ago so how can possibly be hungry again?’

He tried to ignore it however the longer he tried the louder the growling seemed to become. Eventually it became so loud that he was forced to give up on his exercise. Leaping down from the tree he collected his t-shirt and jacket. ‘Well maybe a little snack wouldn’t hurt.’

Silently Ino and Sakura followed Naruto as he walked through the streets, what surprised them was that he wasn’t heading towards Ichiraku Ramen. Instead they found him walking into the barbeque restaurant. This was perfect as barbeque was more fattening then ramen. Excited to see their little project in action first hand they entered the restaurant and saw Naruto sitting in a both by himself.
111231.title: Sakura & Ino

1112311.content:
“Hey Naruto.” Naruto was pouring over the menu wondering what to order when he heard his name being called and looking up from his menu saw Sakura and Ino standing before him “Uh hi Sakura-chan, Ino-chan.”

“Mind if we join you?” Ino asked, she and Sakura didn’t wait for a reply and sat down opposite him on the other side of the both. “So what are you doing here Naruto? Usually whenever I see you eats its always at Ichiraku.”

“Oh I was just doing some training and I felt a little hungry after all that, I came here cos it was closer then Ichiraku was.” Naruto replied “So what about you two?”

“Oh y’know girl stuff.” Sakura replied “Actually we’re in the middle of conducting an experiment and it’s going rather well.”

“Oh that’s great I guess.” Naruto said not entirely sure what they were talking about. “So what do you two want to order?”

“Well why don’t we go for a spread, that way we can all share.” Ino suggested. Not finding a reason to argue Naruto agreed and waved the waitress over, the two girls placed the order surprising Naruto with the size of the order.

Their order placed the three of them made small talk until their food arrived and the three spent the next hour eating; and once they had finished the girls then went about ordering seconds then followed by thirds. By the end of it Nauto’s belly had grown so large that it pushed against the table.

“Damn.” Naruto said staring down at his belly “I think I better start slowing down, if I keep eating like this I’ll end up being fatter then Chouji.” Sakura and Ino almost dropped what they were eating and quickly hid their excitement imagining Naruto being that large.

Under the table Sakura cast a Genjutsu knowing that it was Naruto’s only weakness. Successfully trapping the blond in an illusion both kunoichi slipped round the table. “Forbidden Technique: Hunger Jutsu!” utilising their new jutsu they once again poked Naruto in the belly then retreated back their seats and released the Genjutsu.

Freed from the illusion Naruto’s stomach gave a loud growl. ‘Huh, again. Even after all that food.’ “Hey Sakura, I feel like some desert what about you?” Ino said to her pink haired friend.

“I dunno I wouldn’t mind some chocolate fudge cake and ice cream. “ Sakura replied, she then turned to her test subject “What about you Naruto, would you like some?”

Naruto didn’t answer at first; unsure whether he should eat any more when his stomach growled again “Well maybe just a little.”

The girls called the waitress over and ordered three whole hot chocolate fudge cakes and ice cream bar, when they arrived all the of them began digging in. ‘That’s right Naruto-kun, keep eating. Get bigger...bigger...bigger...’ Both girls thought excitedly as they watched Naruto scarf down his food.

Another hour later all three of them emerged from the restaurant, Ino and Sakura supporting Naruto who was currently groaning. Naruto’s shirt ridden up exposing his humongous engorged belly to the world giving the impression that he was seven months pregnant. Both of them had been sorely tempted to stuff him even more however decided against it as it seemed that Naruto was now so full that he would probably have burst had they pushed him any further.

The two girls escorted Naruto back to his apartment. “Ohh poor Naruto.” Sakura cooed as she and Ino Naruto removed Naruto’s jacket before setting him down on his bed “Do you have a tummy ach?”

“Don’t worry I know just what will make you feel better.” Ino added. The two of them then pushed the bloated blond on to his back, before he could inquire what they had planned the two of them channelled chakra into their hands and began to gently rub away at Naruto’s worn out belly.

“Does that feel good Naruto?” Ino asked sweetly.

"Yeah, y’know you two are good at this." Naruto commented before letting out a yawn, the soothing feel of the girls chakra infused hands rubbing his belly was making him feel sleepy.

"Thanks for the complement Naruto." Sakura said, neither of them heard Naruto respond but judging the easy way the large orb of flesh that they had their hands on rose and fell in a calm and easy rhythm did didn’t take them long to realise that he had fallen asleep. Smiling at one another Ino and Sakura then went about removing Naruto’s ninja sandals before unbuttoning his pants and pulling them down off his legs leaving him in only his t-shirt and boxers.

“He looks so cute like that.” Ino commented as she and Sakura climbed back on the bed either side of the sleeping shinobi. “How much longer are we going to keep this up because I don’t think I can hold out?” she asked running her hand over Naruto’s stomach.

“Oh it shouldn’t be much longer now.” Sakura replied “Soon he will be perfect.” Grinning the two of them then removed their clothes till they were only clad in their underwear and lay next to Naruto and snuggled up to his soft and warm flesh.

“Yes soon Naruto-kun, soon you will be perfect.” Sakura whispered before drifting off to sleep.

113.content: Quite frankly, Tenzou was sick of Kakashi's never-ending rounds of hospital stays and bed-rest. But now he had a plan. 113.title: Kakashi

1132.content:
It was "easy" kidnapping Kakashi. In fact, there had been no kidnapping at all. Tsunade had ordered that he go off to a retreat to rest. It had been easy getting her to agree to having Yamato come along as well.

Kakashi, of course, did not really "like" this plan, and had done everything in his power to avoid it, but to no avail.

Finally, they reached the cabin.

"Well, isn't this quaint?" Kakashi said, groaning at the place's obvious rustic charms.

"I know this isn't exactly your idea of fun, senpai," Yamato said, putting his bags down by the door. "But who knows?"

"Why don't we start off with a new technique I made up?"

"I don't think Tsunade would like me practicing any new jutsu," he said with a smirk under his mask, "but why not? Okay, show me."

Too easy, he thought. "Hypno-Jutsu!"

Is Kakashi caught?
1132.title: Genjutsu

11323.content:
Sharigan!

And just like that, Yamato's plan failed. His eyes grew blank and glassy as his hands fell limply to his side. His face slackened while his body swayed, but stood firm.

"Now," Kakashi asked, giving himself a little pat on the back at his good fortune, "what were you going to do, Tenzou?"

"I was going to use Hypno-Jutsu to hypnotize you into becoming a fat slob..." he said, his voice airy and light, peaceful.

"And why would you do something like that?"

"To protect you, to keep you from dangerous missions..."

"That's very sweet, Tenzou. But I think it's you who needs 'protection', don't you think?"

"I need protection..."

"You do not want to be a ninja anymore, Tenzou. Now it's you who wants to be a fat slob. But you don't really know how big you want to be, so you will seek that confirmation from me."

"I want to be fat...slob...don't know..."

"Good, Tenzou. You won't realize you've been hypnotized. In fact, you will forget you ever wanted to hypnotize me. You like me as your sexy, thin lover, don't you?"

"Wasn't hypnotized...love sexy Kakashi..."

"Yeah. And the only reason we are out here is so that we can focus on making you the fat, disgusting slob you've always wanted to be!"

"Good boy," Kakashi said, patting him on the cheek. "When I clap my hands, you will wake from this jutsu and will remember all of my commands, just not that I hypnotized you."

Kiba blinked, not quite sure of what to make of the sight before him. Naruto had, evidently, been letting himself go, albeit to a slightly greater extent than Kiba had. For one, Naruto's stomach was great deal bigger than Kiba remembered it being; he'd resorted to unzipping his jacket and letting his belly hang out. Still, it stuck out a good distance from underneath his black shirt, pressing against his pants. His arms and legs were a bit thicker as well, and his face had the beginnings of a double chin. Aside from this, though, Naruto's face remained mostly unchanged.

"Wow, you've really let yourself go, Naruto..." Kiba muttered under his breath. He mentally shook himself. "I mean, what the hell are you doing here?"

Naruto grinned. "What, I can't pop over every now and then, dog breath?" He laughed, his belly shaking as he did so.

Kiba frowned. "Not if you don't tell me if you're barging in." He sighed, moving out of the doorway. "Well, since you're here, ya might as well come in."

"Thanks!" Naruto walked into Kiba's room and sat upon his bed. It creaked ominously.

"Nice place ya got here!" Naruto cheerfully pointed this out to Kiba as his eyes wandered about the room. "Little sloppy, though..."

<i>Have you ever seen your own place?!</i> Kiba thought, bristling. Although, Naruto did have a point; what with his doglike habits, his room wasn't the neatest...

As Naruto's eyes continued wandering, they fell upon Kiba's stomach; it was once again beneath his jacket, but was pressing against it with an alarming amount of force, owing to its larger size.

"Whoa... Kiba..." Naruto's eyes grew wide. "Have you gained some weight?"

"Like you're one to talk?" Kiba snapped, reflexively reaching out and poking Naruto's exposed stomach with a finger.

Naruto looked down at his gut. "Oh, this? Yeah, I haven't really been training much. But I've been eating at Ichiraku's more, so maybe you're right." Naruto began massaging his stomach, smiling serenely at the sensations it gave him. A few seconds through, he paused and looked up at his friend. "What about you?" He continued rubbing his belly as he leaned back to listen.

Kiba sighed loudly. "Well, Akamaru got hurt pretty bad in my last mission..." he grimaced, mentally kicking himself for letting his companion get harmed in such a way. "He's at the vet right now, getting worked on. I'd be there with 'im, but they're worried his wounds might be infected; they don't want me near him." Frustrated, he kicked the floor. "So, yeah, I've been stuck here, mostly laying around and eating..." Kiba put his hand on his gut. "I got kind of hungry today, and made myself a snack." His expression changing to a smirk, he smacked the large mass protruding from his waist. "That's how this happened." He looked at it, a reflective expression on his face. "It's not too bad, actually. It's sorta fun to rub..." Of course, Kiba also liked the way it looked, but he wasn't sure he felt comfortable saying that right now.

Naruto paused in his rubbing to glance at Kiba. "Wow, that sucks. About Akamaru, I mean." His face quickly returned to a smile, and he once again commenced his belly rubbing. "You're right, though. This thing <i>is</i> fun to rub." He took one of his hands and used the the fingers to probe his exposed navel, giggling as only a <i>baka</i> like him could.

Kiba watched Naruto, thinking to himself how much fun it would be to spend a half hour or so rubbing <i>his</i> own belly. Before he could think any further, his stomach growled. Kiba winced. "Ah...that reminds me. I haven't finished my food."

Abruptly, Naruto stopped and stood up from the bed. "You have food?! Can I have some?"

Kiba opened his mouth to say 'no,' but faltered. "Ah, what the hell. There's a lot of it left, still." Walking towards the exit, he opened the door. "C'mon, it's down in the kitchen." Naruto followed him, looking excited, until they reached the kitchen. It was then that Naruto let out an audible gasp as he surveyed the mountains of food in the kitchen. "Kiba... This all looks awesome!"

Laughing, Kiba wrapped a friendly arm around the blonde's shoulders. "Yeah, and it tastes awesome too. Smell it, will ya?" Kiba took a deep breath, taking in the smells of the food before them. Unknown to him, however, as his stomach rose from the intake of air, it slowly began to pry apart the teeth of his jacket. Kiba exhaled, and his stomach returned to its previous, bloated size, but the affected teeth, mostly around his stomach, remained partially open.

Motioning to the food, Kiba grinned. "Come on, I'm hungry!" He dove upon the food and started shoveling it down his mouth.

Naruto, clutching his exposed belly in anticipation, followed suit, setting upon the food like a wild animal. It was a feeding frenzy... and both boys were enjoying it immensely.

12512.content:
As the Hokage, Tsunade was constantly under great stress. There was the paperwork, the job of training students, diplomatic work, and so much more for her to do. This was a lot for someone who just three years ago was a wondering gambler with no responsibilities. However, to deal with this stress she relied on her old habits of drinking, gambling, and sleeping, which her assistant, Shizune, did not condone.

"Lady Shizune, you can't be serious about this!" shouted Shizune as she looked at the giant bottle of sake that Tsunade had just signed for with the delivery man. "We can't let any of the students see you drinking this."

"I'm the hokage," said Tsunade as she popped the top off the bottle and started pouring herself a cup, "if I want to drink a little sake then shouldn't that be my business?"

Shizune started struggling with Tsunade to get the lid back on the bottle, "But.. ungh... but Lady Tsunade, when you drink a little... arg... n-no one sees you, but with a bottle this large the students will see what a heavy drinker you are. They all look up to you, what will that do to their image of you and the office of Hokage?"

Tsunade had to think it over, and she sighed when she realized Shizune was right. "Fine, take it away, I'll drink it in my private quarters tonight."

"Thank you Lady Tsunade," said a relieved Shizune, "and, while we're on the subject, do you think it would be possible for you to hold off on all your drinking during office hours?" Tsunade shot her back a look that made Shizune realize she'd gone too far. She tried to laugh it off and said, "Um, ahaha, it's really alright, just a suggestion."

Shizune left Tsunade there in her office, alone without any sake but with lots of stress and paperwork. "Great, now I have to do all this without any kind of buzz," said Tsunade. "Well, at least Shizune didn't say anything about taking these away," said Tsunade as she opened her desk drawer and pulled out a chocolate bar. She started working and munching on the chocolaty snacks and candy bars she kept in her desk for quick energy boost. She only meant to eat one or two, to giver herself something to pass the time, but the more she worked on this paperwork the more distractions she felt she needed. Before the day was over she had eaten her whole week's supply of candy and ordered a pizza. She thought she was just hungry on that day, not realizing she was substituting food for the alcohol she used to enjoy.

However, just because she lost the booze from her bad habits, didn't mean she lost any other ones. She had always been rather lazy, but the kick she got from the alcohol gave her a little extra energy, while this food had the opposite effect, weighing her down. She didn't even bother to wipe the chocolate off her lips, or try to clean up the little grease stain that appeared on her clothes when a pepperoni fell off her pizza and landed on her. And that night when she got home she was feeling so sluggish she didn't even bother to change her clothes or take a shower.

125122.content:
Shizune got to work on time that day and thought that Tsunade was just running late, something that wasn't uncommon for her and seemed to be getting more and more frequent with her. But two hours later she had yet to show up and Shizune was getting nervous. So she decided to go to the Hokage's bedroom, a little secret room located six floors below her office.

She knocked on the door and awaited a response but none came. "Hello? Lady Tsunade?"

There was no answer except for a faint munching noise, and Shizune decided to venture inside. The moment she opened the door a pungent odor hit her that was unlike anything she had ever smelled. The air was so thick she could almost feel it. She looked up and saw Tsunade on her bed, almost a hundred pounds heavier. Her jacket was gone and her belt had been flung off, letting her robe stretch open with her breast pushing both ends of it to the side, letting her stomach hang out and sit on her chubby thick legs. "Oh, Sh(urp)zune," belched Tsunade as she shoved greasy lasagna into her double chinned mouth, "what are you doing here today?"

"What am I doing! What are you doing!"

"I'm relaxing what does it look li- wait a moment," said Tsunade as she lifted one large cheek off the bed and grunted a little. (FRRRRT) "Ah, much better, now what was this about?"

Shizune put her hand over her face as the hot air filled the room. "Lady Tsunade, what has become of you?"

"What, I simply realized something is all." She dug her hand into a tray of lasagna and began stuffing her face again. "Mmm, I (munch) realized that TonTon has it all right."

"TenTen?"

"No, not her (uuuuurp) she's too active. I meant TonTon (faaaart)."

"You're, you're pet pig?" asked Shizune.

"Exactly. He doesn't worry about anything, he just eats and rolls around in the mud all day and letting it all out."

"That's because he's a pig!"

"We could learn a lot from them," said a very calm Tsunade.

In the Hokage's building Shizune swiftly moved through the halls headed toward the office of the Hokage. Shizune carried with her two things she was taking great care in handling. One was the morning reports for the Hokage, just the start of the long list of paper work the Hokage would need to tackle before the day was out, a fact the current Hokage hated. "Good morning Lord Hokage!" beamed Shizune as she burst into the office of the Hokage, Tsunade. "I have your early morning paperwork sorted and ready for you to review. Lucky you, today's first stack is lighter than usu- Huh?" Shizune trailed off as she looked at Tsunade. The chair the Hokage usualy sits in was turned off to the side and all that could be seen was someone's back sticking up behind the desk as they hunched over into one of the drawers. Shizune approched the desk with a frown already knowing what was going on.

Tsunade looked up from the drawer and smiled sheepishly crumbs and frosting dotting her lips. Inside the drawer a half eaten box of frosted tarts was half hidden behind a stack of shinobi preformance reviews, a second already empty box was hidden behind her chair.

"Miss Tsunade I thought you were staring your diet toay!" Shizune chastized her "And aren't those the preformance reports you were supposed to evaluate last thursday?!" Shizune slamed the armload of morning reports down on the desk and yanked the preformance reports out of the desk and stuck them on top the pile of paperwork. "These reports need to be finished, I didn't go to the trouble of dividing all the shinobi up for reveiw this quarter into three groups so you could have the work spaced out for you just so you could push it to the side!" Shizune yelled getting mad as Tsunade just looked up with her with tired eyes.

"Shizune put a sock in it will you?" Tsunade sighed "I'll have them done by the end of the day alright? I only have 4 more to go..." Tsunade sat back up in her chair and pulled the box of tarts out and placed them on the desk beside her pile of paperwork, no sense in trying to hide them now anyway. "Just call in the remaining 4 for their interviews and they'll be done."

Shizune's head slumped forward depressed "But thats only the first batch, the second batch comes in tomorrow and then you'll have to review those and..."

"Tomorrow?!" Tsunade repeated "But I thought you were spacing them out giving me 2 weeks to get through all the shinobi for each group before starting me on the next one!"

"I did!" Shizune fired back "you've had those reports for 2 weeks! If you had spent more time going over them and less time cramming food in your mouth you might have noticed you've been procrastonating about both your work and your diet for 2 whole weeks!" Shizune growled fire in her eyes. Shizune quickly back off calming down and reached for another donut from the box she was holding.

"Oh like you're one to talk!" Tsunade spoke up "You've been hitting the sweets pretty hard yourself lately. I seem to recall it started with just a half dozen box a few weeks ago, now what are you up to? 2 dozen?" Tsunade grew defiant

"It's not 2 dozen it's only a dozen and a half! And I don't plan to eat them all I share these with the other girls filing your left over paperwork!" Shizune got upset again

"Suuuuure you always say that" Tsunade cut in "But by lunch time there will just be an empty box on your desk and you'll be asking what you can pick me up for lunch because you're hungry and you're going out to eat."

"Yeah and you'll order enough food to feed a cow!" Shizune quipped before realizing the mistake.

Tsunade lept over her desk and tried to grab Shizune by the neck so she could pound some respect for the Hokage into her. After a brief struggle the two girls were left panting heavily leaning against oppasite wall of the Hokage office and making every other working in the building wonder what was going on in the Hokage office, none dared to check knowing if it was Tsunade and Shizune again they'd only be pulled into the brawl.

Tsunade placed her arm on the desk panting trying to catch her breath. "<pant pant> Shizune... <pant pant> a thought just struck me... <pant>"

Shizune slumpped down into a chair near the door and let out a long sigh "Y-yes Lady Hokage?" Shizune meekly answered weak from taking on the Hokage.

"<pant pant> Why haven't we recived any reports on the escaped prisoners lately?" Tsunade slowly asked. Shizune nodded her head to one side and sturck a confused look. "Don't tell me you forgot! Several prisoners escaped from the Maximum Security Prison just over 2 weeks ago how could you not remeber?!" Tsunade looked at Shizune conserned.

"Oh my I remeber!" Shizune suddenly lit up "You're right how did I let it slip my mind!? I've been such a scatter brain lately!" Shizune quickly stood and hurried out of the office. Tsunade stood up stright and dusted herself off. Slowly returning to her seat Tsunade reach for another frosted tart when she noticed Shizune left her box of donuts on the desk. Smiling devilishly Tsunade opened the box and picked a few donuts out popping them in her mouth and started thrumbing through the shinobi preformance reveiws, She still had to do the interviews with a few of them before they could be filed. Tsunade looked through to who was left reading them aloud.

"Rock Lee... wonderful I get to spend some time with Gai's energetic clone..." Tsunade sighed 'Sakura Haruno... that shouldn't be so bad... provided she doesn't ask for more leasons today..." Tsunade grumbled "Hinata Hyuga... I'll be lucky if she even takes her eyes off the floor long enough to talk to me" Tsunade shook her head "And lastly... Oh no... Naruto Uzumaki?!" Tsunade's eye twitched and she began gripping the paper hard enough to tear her fingernails into the paper out of frustration.

Shizune returned a few moments later shaking her head "Lady Hokage I don't know why but it seems like we've lost all reconosince on the escaped prisoners. It seems like everyone involved with handing the matter either turned up nothing or just completely forgot to follow up on it. Something isn't adding up..." Shizune stopped and glared at the Hokage. Tsunade looked to her assitant and smiled sheepishly again, part of a donut still hanging out of her mouth, the box of donuts nearly empty.

"Oh you're back already...?" Tsunade tried to brush away the jelly still stuck to her cheek. Shizune charged the Hokage's desk and the two girls fought over what was left of the box of Donuts.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ------------------------------------------------------------

Several hours later Sakura Slowly entered the office of the Hokage, spots of Jelly still stained the walls and celing in several area's from the fight over the last of the donuts. Tsunade tried to look dignified as she patted a stack of paperwork into a neat pile and set them asie before motioning to Sakura to have a seat, there was still some jelly in the Hokage's hair.

Tsunade looked up as Sakura took a seat, Her red dress was tighter, where it once fit perfectly around her wasit it was now stressed, stretched over a softer wider midrift. Sakura's face was fuller, softer around the jaw line. Her arms which were now exposed with her new dress wern't as slim and toned as they once were, now they were smoothed out slightly thicker. Her behind streched her plat pants tighter, the fabric was lighter from the the skin that could be seen between the seems as they pulled the cloth tight against her fleshy rear. Sakura's legs like her arms were softer, no tone left to them, her thighs were lighter with celulite staring to filter in with her skin tone.

"Hello Sakura" Tsunade greeted as the pink haired kunoichi sat down. Tsunade caught sight of a few chocolate bars hanging out of Sakura's kunai pouch as she was leaning forward to sit down. "So Sakura, how are you doing?" Tsunade asked as she glanced over Sakura's file.

"Fine Lady Hokage" Sakura proudly stated. Despite her cheerful confidence Tsunade could see Sakura's hand was digging into the arm of the chair she was sitting in while her other hand rested in her lap slightly stroking the kunai pouch with chocolate bars in it.

Sakura's preformance reveiw didn't go well. Sakura's mind seemed distracted, sometimes taking Sakura a long time to come up with answers. Sakura also had to admit it had been a few weeks since she did any training insteed spending a lot of her time recently taking it easy. By the end of the review Sakura was practicly chewing on her lower lip fingering her pouch of chocolate. with a heavy sigh Tsunade thanked Sakura for her time and sent her on her way after asking her to meet her later that week for a meeting about her training. Sakura jumpped out of her seat her softer body already swaying more than her toned muscle body used to and quickly started for the door not even waiting to get out of the Hokage sight before she yanked a chocolate bar oout and started to tear into it. Already Tsunade was conserned with her star pupil's new behavior.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- --------------------------------------------------------------
Next up was Rock Lee. He entered witha look of determination and quickly took his seat. Lee was still the trim lean fighter he always was. Lee's green tights showed his body's shape was still in top form.

"Good Morning Lee" Tsunade greeted glad to see someone was still taking care of themself. Lee looked at the Hokage with fiery eyes and sat up straight waiting for her review. Lee sat with his legs close together and his hands rigidly on his knees. "So how has your training been going?" Tsunade asked aware of how much detail Lee goes into over his training.

"Well Lady Hokage I have been doing 1000 push ups every morning. And I have been running as many laps around the village as I can until my legs are to tired to even move!" Lee proudly recited every detail of his training as if it were vital to his very life. "And Then I practice all of my fighting moves with the test dummy Sensi Gui provided me. And then I do more laps around the village. And then I.... And then I...." Lee continued on for an hour before Tsunade became to frustrated to listen anymore.

Lee's review went better then Sakura's but Tsunade was still as annoyed as she had been with Sakura after sitting through an hour long chat with Lee about how his training was going. Lee stood and jogged out of the Hokage's office picking up speed as he went.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------
Next was Hinata Hyuga. Hinata sheepishly entered tugging at the bottom of her Coat. Hinata was as bad off as Sakura, maybe worse. Her belly was pushing against her coat forcing it to lift up trying to expose the bottom of her belly but Hinata kept tugging at it in an attempt to hide the fleshy belly underside. Unlike Sakura, Hinata seemed aware of her recent weight changes. However just like Sakura, Hinata was doing little to remedy the problem as her coat pockets seemed to bulge with snacks and sweets. Hinata's bust was also fuller bouncing more than usual as she awkwardly approtched the Hokage with her eyes buried in the floor shyling twisting a lock of her hair. Hinata's face was wider her checks filling outwards and turning red as she blushed aware the Hokage was eyeing her up and down as she got closer. Hinata's legs were a little better off than Sakura's still holding some tone and not over run with celulite but they were still not the shape they were once in.

Hinata sat slowly pointing her fingers into each other and rubbing them together in slow circles, her coat lifting higher as her soft belly and love handles mashed together and formed a larger roll of fat that allowed her belly button to peak out from under her coat. Hinata quickly realized the Hokage was eyeing the deer navel and squeeked as she yanked down on the coat hiding her soft pale belly.

"....Hello Hinata" Tsunade said closing her eyes and slumping back in her seat.

"H-Hello L-L-ady Ho-Ho-Hokage...." Hinata stumbled over her words turning bright red her eyes stareing miles into the floor.

Hinata's interveiw went very badly. She was so shy about her weight she could barely answer any questions. Worse still any mention about her weight made Hinata withdraw into her mental shell completely losing the ability to speak. Hinata spent much of the Interveiw listening to Tsunade recap her recent decline in preformance over the last few weeks and only give a short high pitched yes or no before turning her face back to the hold in the floor she was buring with her intense stare all the while her cpat slowly riding up again so her Belly button could be seen again. Hinata left the Interveiw with a brisk walk trying to get away from Tsunade's sight as fast as she could her new poundage shaking all the way. Before she was out the door Tsunade could see Hinata's hands deep in her pockets dragging candy out and putting it in her mouth.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -----------------------------------------------------------------
Last was Naruto Uzumaki. Tsunade scowled when Naruto entered her office in his usual manner, hands crossed behind his head swaggering like he was king of the world. Naruto was at least as well of as Lee had been. He also had avoided the lazy routine Tsunade was seeing in many of her reports. Naruto's Orange jacket and pants were still fitting perfectly and his hace showed no sign of any double chin.

Naruto proudly came in and took a seat without being told even starting the conversation himself

"So whats up Grandma Tsunade?" He asked chipper and boldly

"I told you to stop calling me that!" Tsunade barked already upset with him. "So hows your trainign been going..." She sighed hoping to get this over with.

"Well with pervy sage out of town I haven't been able to train much with him but I have been getting a lot of practice at stealth manuvers and outrunning my foes" Naruto explained picking at his ear.

"Oh?" Tsunade asked not convinced "Just who are these foe's you've been hinding from and outrunning exactly?"

'Sakura mostly!" Naruto jumppd in "That girl's been snacking like crazy and I made one little comment about it, now every time she sees me she tries to pound my face into the dirt! She won't leave me alone for two seconds I tell ya!"

'I see..." Tsunade sighed thumpping her head into the desk

"Ino is no better!" Naurto started up again "She may actually be hitting the buffet harder than Sakura! All I did was suggest she get out more often and spend less time behind the flower shop counter with a bag of chips in her hand! Now shes trying to kill me too"

"You didn't..." Tsunade looked up, even she was surprised Naruto could be so bone headed "Still I'm shocked Ino is letting this new trend get to her too..." Tsunade trailed off thinking

"Yeah but Lee's the worst one of all!" Naruto yelled

"Lee?!" Tsunade shot back shocked 'But he was just in here this morning he's not having any weight trouble..."

"No it's not that!" Naruto waved his hands "Just the oppasite! Lee's been looking for a sparing partner! And with everyone snackign their butts off I'm the only one he says would make a real challange for him! Now he's been hunting high and low so he can drag me off to that dojo of his..."

Tsunade had had enough "Naruto I have a mission for you.." She said standing up

"Yeah! Woohoo! Mission Yeah!" Naruto cheered "Ehhh...but wait, what about my review...?" Naruto asked calming down.

"It will have to wait' Tsunade told him "Something is going on in the village. To many of our Shinobi are getting lazy and slacking off from their duties, I think this is more than just some bad case of couch potato syndrome, I think someone or something may be behind this bizzare behavior! I want you and Rock Lee to head out and investigate!" She commanded

'Lee?" Naruto repeated "Why Bushy Brows?"

"Because you and Lee are the only ones not acting lazy" Tsunade explained "What ever is going on isn't affecting you two so you two will be the ones to go around the village and gather information, then report back to me so we can decide what needs to be done. if you find anyone else who isn't falling into this behavior bring them too, as well as Shikamaru, If anyone can figure out what might be behind this strange new phenomina it's him."

"You got it Grandma Tsunade!" Naruto smiledand took off out of Tsunade's office. Tsunade just shook her head and sat back at her desk to finish her paperwork.As she worked her hand kept wanding into the bag of cookies hidden in her desk drawer.
12533222221.title: New threat to Kohona: Laziness!

choices: Spy on the girls some more.
125332222211.content:
Naruto left Tsunade’s office soon after his evaluation. “Oh man this mission is going to be so cool!” he said with excitement, but then he thought to himself “but why do I have to work with Bushy Brows?!”

a few minutes later Naruto met up with Rock Lee in the woods. Lee was doing some pushups and got up when he was done.
“Ah ha, I see you have finally come to spar with me Naruto! You will have to forgive me I only did 500 one handed pushups today for each arm.”
Naruto shrieked and said “no, no, no, no, no Lee, I’m here to tell you that you that we got a new mission from Tsunade!”
Rock Lee said, “Oh ok! I guess I’ll have to wait until were done! So, what is the mission?”
“We have to figure out why so many people have been getting lazy.” Said Naruto
“I knew it! I thought people were getting lazier!” said Rock Lee.
“I suggest we look around town first to see who’s affected by it,” said Naruto.

The two ninjas rushed into town to observe this phenomenon. They got into the village and started their surveillance. They noticed that it was mostly women slugging around. Most of them were fatter, smellier, and just plain old lazier. The two then ran into Neji.

“Hey Neji, you just came back from a mission with Ten Ten right?” said Lee.
“Yes I did. Why do ask?” said Neji.
“We need to know how was Ten Ten acting during the mission.” said Naruto.
“Huh, how was she acting during the mission? It was almost a disaster.”
“What!? How so?” asked Naruto.
“It was a C-ranked mission, simple to say the least. We had to protect some cargo coming to the village. There were some attacks but nothing we couldn’t handle. However, Ten Ten was off her mark on this mission. She woke up late, ate more than her fair share of the food, and hardly could fight. I had to watch out for her the whole time. The mission took 4 days instead of 2.”
“I cant believe it, Ten Ten is always on point.” Said Lee.
“Thanks for your help Neji.” said Naruto. And then they were off.

They went off to ask their friends about how the girls were acting. First, Chouji said that Ino was eating just as much as him now. Next, Kiba and Shino said Hinata was lazier too. Then, Kakashi and Asuma told them that Anko and Kurenai were burping and farting a lot while on missions. Even when they were getting some ramen they noticed the shop owners daughter was stuffing her face. Finally they noticed that even Tsunade and Shizune were getting fat too.

“Man its like some type of epidemic or something!” said Naruto.
“We must go back and report to Shikamaru!” said Lee.
They arrived at Shikamaru’s house and saw him sleeping on the porch.
“Oh no! He has got it too!” said Lee.
“No he’s always like this.” Said Naruto “hey! Wake up Shikamaru!” yelled Naruto.
“What the? Oh it’s you guys. What do you want?” said Shikamaru.
“All the girls are turning into slobs in the entire village! We have to report back to the Hokage and tell her,” said Lee.
“You guys are just now noticing it? I’ve seen it happen to a lot of women in the past two weeks.” said Shikamaru.
“What?! Why didn’t you tell anyone!” yelled Naruto.
“It would be another problem I would have to worry about.” said Shikamaru.
“Well whatever. When did you first see it?” asked Lee.
“I first saw when I was in the sand village a few days ago. Temari could hardly hold her fan. And most of the women there were slobs too. I also noticed that this happened around the same time of that prison breakout. Someone must have been responsible for this.”
“Alright then! Lets gather everyone we interviewed and go back to Grandma Tsunade and report this to her!” said Naruto.
“Aww man…what a drag.” said Shikamaru.
125332222211.title: The Slob Epidemic

1253322222111.content:
The gang raced back to Tsunade's as they caught her snacking on numerous chocolate eclairs.
"back so soon?" Tsunade said as she quickly finished the one she was eating and hid the others "what have you found out?" she asked as the three young boys began to explain everything they had found out so far.
Namely:
1-All the women in Konoha had gained weight, stopped caring about their hygene and started to flatulate more
2-Only women seemed to be effected
3-Even the Hokage was effected (though this one almost got Naruto killed for blurting it out like an idiot)
4-It seemed to have all started around the time that those prisoners escaped
5-No one seems to remember anything about those prisoners, neither male nor female

"therefor it is probebly safe to conclude that the prisoners who escaped are to blame behind everything that is going on" Shikamaru said "in order to fix this mess we need to locate and capture the prisioners, the longer we take the bigger and lazier the girls of Konoha are going to get and I believe that if we do not locate them in the next week or two then it will be too late and the women of Konoha will be too set with their new lifestyles to ever change back"

"well then" Tsunade said sternly "its your boys job to try and find as much as you can about these escaped prisioners as you can, the problem is they could be anywhere now. Just remember though, if you mess up then the number of ninja's we have will be halfed and your work will therefore be doubled. So if you ever want some free time again then you better find out where they are!" she said as the boys all agreed and left shortly after. Tsunade taking out the eclairs before they had even left.

"so where shall we start?" Naruto asked the three boys as they had a two week deadline, every minuite they waste is more weight the girls are gaining and the lazier they become.

"well" Shikamaru yawned lazily "we could either..."

Staying put as the mission came first
1253322222112.content:
"ahh Grandma Tsunade isnt going anywhere" Naruto decided suddenly "lets go gather more info" he grinned
"from where?" Lee asked
"well lets go spy on each girl individually and see if we can learn anything" he suggested
"sounds like a waste of time to me" Shikamaru replied "we're not going to see anything other then that which we've found out already. The girls are eating more and caring about their hygene and manners less"
"but we might be able to find some clues if we spy on the girls as indivduals rather then as a whole" Lee said as he agreed with Naruto
"good going Bushy Brows, lets go find Sakura first. But she cant know we're watching her" Naruto grinned as he ran off
"Sakura..." Lee blushed as he followed as well, hoping to see his crush hadnt been hit too badly by the same condition that was going around.
"how bothersome" Shikamaru sighed and left to follow them.

They found Sakura at home with her feet up and sitting on the sofa, she was surrounded by candy wrappers and empty packets of chips as she looked like she had barly moved from that spot for some time.
Her belly had gotten a bit larger then it was at the meeting with Tsunade as her clothes were even tigher and truth be told she hadnt left that spot at all since then. Sakura drank the last of a can of cola as she belched and threw it to the floor, Naruto sniggering at her display of slobbery, Lee however was too lovestruck to care. Even in her fattened, lazy, smelly state she was still a goddess to him and he wanted to go there and do nothing more then look after her, love her and make sure she was so happy and cared for that she never had to leave from that spot.
Lee was about to make his move to go down and do just that but Shikamaru put his hand on Lee's shoulder and whispered "we're on a mission remember, put your feelings aside and dont do anything stupid"
Needless to say Lee ended up...
